channel.title: Michelin (2) on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Michelin (2) on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Evvai
item.description: This is our first trip together to Brazil and SÃ£o Paulo together. I’ve met many Brazilians at work, but I did not have any idea what to really expect out of the gourmand food scene. Unlike New York City, many of these Michelin Star restaurants were easier to get into. My partner chose this recently rewarded Michelin 2 star restaurant, Evvai, because it was known for showcasing Brazilian ingredients in a refine way.
